played this a bunch when i wore a younger mans clothes 26 years ago  whats really exciting about this game was that the encounter with the xenomorphs were often times completly unscripted by the game you could be hiding in a ventilation shaft in some corner of the map and a xeno would crawl in at random and tear into you  weak graphics by contemporary  standards of course but an intense horrorshooter experience thats worth trying out today

a great game for the time 1999 now its starting to show its age preferred the windows 98 version as you could host your own mp game and join from other pcs on lan without having to use steam and it made for great mp fun  still i can confirm with proton the classic 2000 version here can run fine in linux whilst the original w98 version cannot run on anything newer then w98 se get it if its on sale and you are into retro pc games
